TITLE: Episode 42 - Red Pill of the Week: The City That Bombed Itself
DESCRIPTION: I wanted to rewind the clock and re-share our first Red Pills. This was originally a part of Episode 28. In this Red Pill, we take a look at the time that the Philadelphia Police Department bombed their own city.
